Nitobi.BaseTreeNode

Nitobi.BaseTreeNode Class Reference

Defines all of the know properties that can be specified for a tree node. The data source the tree is bound to for its events could be a list of these objects, but isnt required. More...

Detailed Description

Defines all of the know properties that can be specified for a tree node. The data source the tree is bound to for its events could be a list of these objects, but isnt required.
